title: Research Garmin running workout API
description: Fetch running workouts via API to understand JSON structure: interval types, pace targets, HR zones, distance units, repeat groups
notes:
## API Research Findings

### Pace Targets
- targetType: {workoutTargetTypeId, workoutTargetTypeKey} - e.g., pace.zone (id=6), no.target (id=1)
- targetValueOne/Two: pace in m/s (meters per second)
- Conversion: pace_mps = 1609.344 / seconds_per_mile
- targetValueOne = faster pace, targetValueTwo = slower pace

### Distance/Time Units
- preferredEndConditionUnit: {unitId, unitKey, factor}
  - mile: id=4, factor=160934.4
  - meter: id=1, factor=100.0
- endConditionValue in meters (distance) or seconds (time)

### Repeat Groups (RepeatGroupDTO)
- numberOfIterations: count
- skipLastRestStep: boolean (Skip Last Recover)
- smartRepeat: boolean
- workoutSteps: nested steps

### Step Types
- warmup (1), cooldown (2), interval (3), recovery (4), rest (5), repeat (6)

### End Conditions  
- lap.button (1), time (2), distance (3), iterations (7)
close_reason: Completed API research. Found pace target fields (targetType, targetValueOne/Two in m/s), preferredEndConditionUnit, skipLastRestStep for repeat groups.
